title: Exploring regular black holes within the framework of the TFD formalism
authors: Jhonny A. A. Ruiz and A. F. Santos
abstract:
In this paper, a massive scalar field non-minimally coupled with gravity is
considered. Assuming a regular and spherically symmetric background,
specifically a regular black hole solution, the energy-momentum tensor is
calculated. Using the Thermo Field Dynamics (TFD) formalism and its topological
structure, the corresponding Stefan-Boltzmann law and Casimir effect are
investigated. The results for the regular black hole are compared with those
obtained for the Schwarzschild black hole.
